product_name: Vasque Pendulum Trail-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Pendulum Trail-Running Shoes from Vasque strike the perfect balance between a lightweight minimalist design and enough padding and support to tackle rocky trails. Shoes keep the foot close to the ground and optimally positioned for natural forefoot strike. At the same time, an EVA midsole and TPU plate protect the runner from the occasional hard heel strike or wayward stone. Bonded upper minimizes hot spots, while a toothy outsole maximizes miles over sketchy terrain. Pendulum Trail-Running Shoes are the lightest-weight trail running shoes made by Vasque. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Pendulum Trail-Running Shoes from Vasque strike the perfect balance between a lightweight minimalist design and enough padding and support to tackle rocky trails.
